metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47235 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occur when a malformed BGP UPDATE message with an EOR is processed, because the presence of EOR does not lead to a treat-as-withdraw outcome.

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: quagga package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
